function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spatial disparities in transport infrastructure correlated with H1N1 outbreak impacts","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease spread due to limited access to healthcare and resources","Mitigation":"Improving transport infrastructure and access to healthcare in underserved areas","Technologies":"Transport network optimization, telemedicine","People":"Population in areas with limited transport infrastructure","Owner":"Government, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"High density residential areas linked to COVID-19 outbreak","Impact":"Higher concentration of cases and spread of disease in densely populated areas","Mitigation":"Urban development and planning to reduce density and improve access to healthcare","Technologies":"Urban planning, public space design","People":"Residents in high density areas","Owner":"Urban planners, local government"},{"Description":"Transmission of COVID-19 due to air pollution-to-human transmission","Impact":"Increased vulnerability to COVID-19 in areas with high air pollution","Mitigation":"Air quality improvement and public health interventions","Technologies":"Air pollution monitoring, air quality improvement technologies","People":"Populations in areas with high air pollution","Owner":"Environmental agencies, public health authorities"}]}
